message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you an incredible opportunity to purchase this exceptional product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe it's a great opportunity for us to come to a mutually beneficial agreement. What do you think?

I understand your perspective, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $13000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $13500? I think that's a fair compromise considering the value of the product.
